www.title: Miit - Improve your communication easily and quickly!
www.description: Miit is a web application which will change the way you communicate with your team or your audience.
www.header.title: Improve your communication
www.header.subtitle: with Miit, a web application which meets your needs
www.subscribe.alt: Sign up to receive information about Miit
www.subscribe.title: Sign up now
www.subscribe.subtitle: Keep in touch and enjoy a privileged relationship with our teams.
www.beta.access.development: Miit is still in development, and we need your help to best meet your needs and desires.
www.beta.access.subscribe: Sign up for the newsletter to receive beta access to the platform when it opens, and to share with our teams on every subjects.
www.build.space.title: Build a unique space
www.build.space.subtitle: Install as many applications as you want to create a space that exactly meets your needs.
www.apps.title: Several apps already available
www.apps.description: Miit is dividing each of its features in Apps to give you the maximum flexibility and allow you to customize your communication environment as desired.
www.apps.chat.title: Chat
www.apps.chat.description: Communicate with your teams or your audience directly.
www.apps.quiz.title: Quiz
www.apps.documents.title: Document sharing
www.apps.wall.title: Wall of questions
www.apps.wall.description: Give your audience the chance to ask you questions.
www.apps.tasks.title: To-do list
www.apps.tasks.description: Follow and manage your team's tasks.
www.apps.calendar.title: Calendar
www.apps.calendar.description: Share a schedule with your users.
www.cases.title: Some use case examples
www.cases.1.title: Conference organization
www.cases.1.description: Improve the interactivity of your conferences by collecting your audience questions without disrupting your presentation, and answer them when you want : you don't need to give your micro when someone has a question ! You can also switch roles and survey your audience to adapt your speech to your audience.
www.cases.2.title: Meeting arrangement
www.cases.2.description: It's sometimes difficult to give the floor to everyone and to define clear objectives during meetings. Miit allows everybody to give its opinion, vote for its favorite solution, access the document you want to share, and, after the meeting, keep a precise image of it in order to come back on it later.
www.cases.3.title: Complex projects management
www.cases.3.description: Keep track of your projects and your teams, task after task. Organize and share your calendars with who you want by monitoring access and modification rights of everyone in a few clicks.
www.cases.4.title: Other needs?
www.cases.4.description: The strength of Miit is its power of customization. Create your space according to your current needs and save your template to reuse it later.
www.contact.title: Keep in touch
www.contact.subtitle: Stay informed of our latest news by subscribing to the newsletter..
www.contact.social: Or follow us on social networks.

mail.invite.body:
Bonjour,

Pour vous connecter rendez-vous sur %s ou cliquez sur le boutton ci-dessous
mail.new_account.title: Bienvenue sur Miit
mail.new_account.body:
Bienvenue,

Votre compte Miit a bien été créé.
mail.new_miit.title: Nouveau Miit
mail.new_miit.body:
Bonjour,

Votre espace Miit %s a bien été créé. Pour vous connecter rendez-vous sur votre page %s ou cliquez sur le boutton ci-dessous.
mail.new_miit.invite: Vous pouvez dès à present inviter des nouveaux utilsateurs et installer toutes les application dont vous avez besoin.
